scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run spec
scripts.cover: unit-coverage run -s 'lib/**' -t 'spec/**/*.spec.js' -S relative -O sources=lib -O tests=spec -- --opts ./spec/mocha.opts lib spec
scripts.cover-lcov: mkdir -p coverage && unit-coverage run -r lcov -o ./coverage/lcov.info -s 'lib/**' -t 'spec/**/*.spec.js' -S relative -O sources=lib -O tests=spec -- --opts ./spec/mocha.opts lib spec
scripts.cover-html: mkdir -p coverage && unit-coverage run -r html -o ./coverage/coverage.html -s 'lib/**' -t 'spec/**/*.spec.js' -S relative -O sources=lib -O tests=spec -- --opts ./spec/mocha.opts lib spec
scripts.travis: npm run test && npm run cover-lcov && npm run coveralls
